channel.title: Projects on Mark Merante
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Mark Merante

item.title: Customer Segmentation Analysis
item.description: I have attempted to find precise segmentation of customers on a given unsupervised mall dataset with the use of K-Means clustering algorithm along with data visualization tools (using plotly python library) to assist in classifying accurate segmentation of customers. Link to this project

item.title: Credit Risk Analysis
item.description: In this analysis, I have attempted to predict whether an applicant will default on a loan. I have looked at variables such as age, personal income, years of employment, and among other variables by using exploratory analysis such as correlation and predictive models such as logistic regression and linear discriminant analysis to help aid in accurately predicting if loans will default. Link to this project

item.title: League of Legends (Online Gaming) Analysis
item.description: I have made an analysis involving the game ‘League Of Legends’. In this analysis, I have investigated whether the laning phase heavily affects the outcome of a game over objectives. I have used methods such as correlation analysis and logistic regression to help aid my analysis. I have gathered data from professional league of legends games to make this analysis possible. Link to this project
